Class Sudoku

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sudoku

  • public class Sudoku
extends java.lang.Object
    A data type to represent sudoku boards in Java. Sudokus are stored as an array of byte tiles. A sudoku board of size n contains n^4 tiles.

    Sudoku generation from API comes from QQWing's sudoku generator https://qqwing.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Method Detail

      • generateSolved

        public static Sudoku generateSolved(Sudoku sud,
                                    java.util.Random random)
        Returns a solved version of the sudoku sud. Note that this method returns a distict object and does not modify the original Sudoku. If there is more than one solution, this method will return a random solution.

      • generateSolved

        public static Sudoku generateSolved(Sudoku sud)
        Returns a solved version of the sudoku sud. Note that this method returns a distict object and does not modify the original Sudoku. If there is more than one solution, this method will return a random solution.

      • generateFromApi

        public static Sudoku[] generateFromApi(int amount,
                                       java.lang.String difficulty)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates amount Sudokus using the QQWIng API, with difficulty equal to difficulty. Valid difficulties are "simple","easy","intermediate","expert","unknown",or "random". "random" difficulty chooses one of "simple","easy","intermediate", or "expert" with equal probability.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateFromApi

        public static Sudoku generateFromApi(java.lang.String difficulty)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates 1 Sudoku using the QQWIng API, with difficulty equal to difficulty. Valid difficulties are "simple","easy","intermediate","expert","unknown",or "random". "random" difficulty chooses one of "simple","easy","intermediate", or "expert" with equal probability.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateFromApi

        public static Sudoku[] generateFromApi(int amount)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates amount Sudokus using the QQWIng API, with difficulty equal to "unknown".
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateFromApi

        public static Sudoku generateFromApi()
                              throws java.lang.Exception

        Throws:
